scripts.reinstall: npm run uninstall && npm run update
scripts.start: npm run lint && npm run ts-node src/bootstrap/start.ts
scripts.start:test: npm run lint && npm run ts-node src/test.ts
scripts.start:dev: npm run lint && npm run ts-node:inspect src/bootstrap/start.ts
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV='test'  npm run ts-node node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js
scripts.test:dev:brk: cross-env NODE_ENV='test' npm run ts-node:inspect:brk node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js
scripts.buildProd: npm run tsc && xcopy .\certificates .\build\certificates /s /e /i /y && xcopy .\config .\build\config /s /e /y /i && xcopy .\src\api\v1\consultation\*.html .\build\app\api\v1\consultation /s /e /y /i && xcopy .\src\api\v1\consultation\*.js .\build\app\api\v1\consultation /s /e /y /i
